labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Belgium', 'Singapore', 'United States of America', 'Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services', 'Telecommunications Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Belgium', 'Singapore', 'United States of America']

Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Netherlands', 'Spain', 'United States of America', 'Energy', 'Telecommunications Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Netherlands', 'Spain', 'United States of America', 'Telecommunications Services']
